content: MT-CC-40D U-Fitting Clamp for channel-to-channel or channel-to-girder cross-connections with MT strut channel ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compatible with MT Twist-Lock and MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Universal – complete many different applications using few parts Twist-lock and Thread Forming Bolt channel connector takes up shear and tensile loads Compatible with multiple strut channel/girder profiles Applications Cross-connection of one strut channel to another channel or girder Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2322398 - Clamp MT-CC-40D - Package Size 10 pc
